mapper.select: SELECT a.address, a.order_id, b.license_id, b.vehicle_no, a.depart_time, c.dep_time, a.order_time, a.dep_longgitude, a.dep_latitude, a.departure, a.dest_longgitude, a.dest_latitude, a.destination FROM t_order_start a INNER JOIN t_order_succes b on a.order_id = b.order_id INNER JOIN t_depart c on a.order_id = c.order_id WHERE a.uuid NOT IN('1','2')
